content: the same with the bikini tops then find the middle of the body between st 62 and 63 position the two bikini top pieces so that they sit at equal distances from the middle of the body i positioned them each three stitches from the middle point so that there was a total of 6 stitches between them make sure that the front of the bikini top and the front of the body are facing each other pin them into place using the long tail from the bikini top sew the top and body together repeat for the second bikini top piece attach straps to top by sewing the widest end of the straps to the top of the bikini tops
